name: Technical SEO
description: Evaluates crawlability, structured data, page speed, mobile-friendliness, and technical infrastructure.

insights.title: Excellent Core Web Vitals
insights.description: All pages pass CWV thresholds with LCP < 2.2s, FID < 80ms, and CLS < 0.08. This directly impacts AI crawl prioritization.

insights.title: Comprehensive Schema Markup
insights.description: 85% of pages have appropriate structured data, helping AI understand your content semantically.

insights.title: Clean URL Structure
insights.description: URLs are semantic, short, and keyword-optimized with logical hierarchy.

issues.title: JavaScript Rendering Delays
issues.description: 12 pages rely heavily on client-side rendering, potentially invisible to AI crawlers.

issues.title: Missing Hreflang Tags
issues.description: International content lacks proper hreflang implementation, causing AI confusion on regional targeting.

issues.title: Broken Internal Links
issues.description: 7 pages have broken internal links, fragmenting site architecture signals.

recommendations.description: Convert client-rendered pages to server-side rendering for better AI crawlability.
recommendations.estimatedImpact: Improved AI indexing of dynamic content

recommendations.description: Implement proper hreflang tags for all international content variations.
recommendations.estimatedImpact: Correct regional targeting in AI responses

recommendations.description: Repair or redirect all broken internal links to maintain crawl efficiency.
